name: polls-monorepo
description: Polls application with FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && poetry run ruff check .
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && poetry run ruff format .
